tutorials.title: Register your local machine to SSH into Sessions
tutorials.description: Set up your local machine for SSH access to connect to your Shakudo sessions, enabling development remotely on your local machine.

tutorials.title: Link to a new Git Repository
tutorials.description: Connect to multiple Git repositories and access your code in Shakudo workloads

tutorials.title: Chatbot for beginners: Build a RAG chatbot with LLMs
tutorials.description: Build a Dify RAG chatbot for PDF files

tutorials.title: [Advanced] Build a RAG agent with LLMs and vector database
tutorials.description: Build a Dify RAG agent for Markdown files using Airbyte, MinIO, Qdrant, and Shakudo microservices

tutorials.title: NLP SQL Chatbot in Dify using OpenSource model
tutorials.description: Build a chatbot which answers questions for tabular data in Dify using open-souce LLM model
